document.title: Company (Extract)
document.citation: Simple English Wikipedia: “Company”. Retrieved from https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Company on 20 Aug 2015.
document.body: A company is a type of business. The definition of the term varies by country. In general, a company is the same as a corporation. It is a business organization which makes goods in an organized manner and sells them to the public for profit. [“Company”]
